title: Pathfinder (4C129)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship or Regroup: Spot a ranger to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).
Lore:	”'If you take my counsel, you will not turn eastward yet. Go straight on, for thus you will have the cover of the woodland for many miles.'”
Rarity:	C
